channel.description: Recent content in pages on Fredrik K. Gustafsson | Postdoc | Machine Learning for Computational Pathology

item.title: Feedback
item.description: Please feel free to leave any type of anonymous feedback on my presentation at the following link: https://forms.gle/pfkhxdRzEE7ETmcs8

item.title: News
item.description: [Jul 3, 2024] Accepted paper: Evaluating Regression and Probabilistic Methods for ECG-Based Electrolyte Prediction, work lead together with Philipp Von Bachmann and Daniel Gedon, has been published in Scientific Reports. [Apr 15, 2024] Accepted paper: Photo-Realistic Image Restoration in the Wild with Controlled Vision-Language Models has been accepted to CVPR Workshops 2024. This is follow-up work on our ICLR paper, once again lead by Ziwei Luo. [Mar 21, 2024] Invited talk: I presented How Reliable is Your Regression Model’s Uncertainty Under Real-World Distribution Shifts?
